MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL15 and LL16 postcode areas of Ruthin and Denbigh. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required due to a broken pole and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:55PM on 11th March 2021.
